mercury_retrograde.name: Mercury Retrograde
mercury_retrograde.description: Mercury retrograde is known for communication breakdowns, travel delays, and misunderstandings.
advice: Avoid signing new contracts if possible

venus_retrograde.name: Venus Retrograde
venus_retrograde.description: Venus retrograde influences relationships, love, beauty, and finances.

mars_retrograde.name: Mars Retrograde
mars_retrograde.description: Mars retrograde slows down energy, motivation, and may cause frustration.

jupiter_transits.name: Jupiter Transit
jupiter_transits.description: Jupiter represents growth, wisdom, and expansion. Its transits bring opportunities for learning and abundance.

saturn_transits.name: Saturn Transit
saturn_transits.description: Saturn symbolizes discipline, structure, and responsibility. Its transits bring challenges but also maturity.
effects: Facing responsibilities related to empathy and spirituality

rahu_ketu_transits.name: Rahu & Ketu Transit
rahu_ketu_transits.description: Rahu (North Node) and Ketu (South Node) signify karmic lessons, illusions, and spiritual growth.
rahu_ketu_transits.current_position: Rahu in Pisces, Ketu in Virgo (until October 2025)
effects: Lessons in balancing logic and intuition
